attributes.comment:
To improve fiscal efficiency,it's recommended CMS use the National Directory of Healthcare Providers and Services to transmit electronic reminders biannually to all health care providers participating in Medicare programs. Reiterating the meaning or

definition of "Medically Necessary".

Annual communications related to the program's "medically necessary" requirements would promote

fiscal efficiencies by having the provider mindful of only necessary appropriate services to

treat and diagnose illness,injury,conditions,diseases or symptoms are allowed for payment.

--
This submission may or may not contain error and or flaw.

Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 and or The Americans with Disabilities Act

shall apply.
